title: Port blending and interpolation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestIssue11 (GitHub issue about blending) and TestInterpolation (angular interpolation). Ensure blending methods are correctly tested.

title: Port go-colorful tests to Crystal specs
description: Port test files from vendor/go-colorful to Crystal spec files. Include colors_test.go, hexcolor_test.go, hsluv_test.go, etc.

title: Port core color struct and conversions from go-colorful
Port distance calculation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestLabDistance, TestCIE94Distance, TestCIEDE2000Distance from colors_test.go. Include dists table with ground-truth values from Bruce Lindbloom.

title: Port fast linear RGB approximation tests from Go to Crystal spec
description: Port TestFastLinearRgb with eps tolerance of 6/255. Ensure fast approximation is 'good enough'.
